name: superprompt-forge
description: Git Stash Management & Gist Notes for VS Code

superprompt-forge.autoRefresh.description: Automatically refresh the stash list when git changes are detected or the window regains focus.

superprompt-forge.confirmOnDrop.description: Show a confirmation dialog before dropping a stash.

superprompt-forge.confirmOnClear.description: Show a confirmation dialog before clearing all stashes.

superprompt-forge.showFileStatus.description: Show M/A/D status indicators on file items in the stash tree.

superprompt-forge.defaultIncludeUntracke.description: Default to including untracked files when creating a stash.

enumDescriptions: Show newest stashes first (default git order)
superprompt-forge.sortOrder.description: Sort order for the stash list.

superprompt-forge.showBranchInDescriptio.description: Show the branch name in the stash item description.

superprompt-forge.notes.autosaveDelay.description: Autosave delay in seconds for note editing. Set to 0 to disable autosave.

enumDescriptions: New notes are created as secret Gists (default)
New notes are created as public Gists
superprompt-forge.notes.defaultVisibilit.description: Default visibility for newly created notes.

superprompt-forge.mattermost.serverUrl.description: Mattermost server URL (e.g. https://mattermost.example.com). Required for Mattermost integration.

superprompt-forge.google.clientId.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID for Google Drive integration. Create one at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

superprompt-forge.google.clientSecret.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client Secret. Required alongside Client ID for Google Drive authentication.

superprompt-forge.ai.includeSecretGists.description: Include secret Gist note content when gathering AI context for summaries, chat, and agent analysis. When disabled, only public notes are shared with the language model.

superprompt-forge.ai.includePrivateMessa.description: Include direct messages and group messages from Mattermost when gathering AI context. When disabled, only public and private channel posts are shared with the language model.

enumDescriptions: Auto — use Copilot when available, fall back to Gemini
Copilot — always use GitHub Copilot (requires Copilot extension)
Gemini — always use Gemini API (requires API key)
superprompt-forge.ai.provider.description: Which AI provider to use. 'auto' prefers Copilot when available and falls back to Gemini.

superprompt-forge.ai.geminiApiKey.description: Google Gemini API key for AI features (summaries, chat, agent). Required when GitHub Copilot is not available (e.g. in Cursor, Windsurf, or Antigravity). Get a free key at https://aistudio.google.com/apikey

enumDescriptions: Gemini 2.0 Flash — previous generation fast model
Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite — fastest, most lightweight
superprompt-forge.ai.geminiModel.description: Default Gemini model to use when the Gemini provider is active.

superprompt-forge.ai.modelOverride.summa.description: Override model for AI summaries. Leave empty to use the provider default.

superprompt-forge.ai.modelOverride.chat.description: Override model for AI chat. Leave empty to use the provider default.

superprompt-forge.ai.modelOverride.agent.description: Override model for AI agent analysis. Leave empty to use the provider default.

viewsWelcome.contents:
No workspace folder open.
[Open Folder](command:vscode.openFolder)

Not a git repository.
Initialize a repository to start using stashes.
[Initialize Repository](command:git.init)

No stashes yet.
Stash your changes to save them for later.
[Create Stash](command:superprompt-forge.stash)

Sign in to GitHub to sync your notes as Gists.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:superprompt-forge.notes.signIn)

No notes yet.
Create a note to get started.
[Create Note](command:superprompt-forge.notes.create)

Sign in to GitHub to see your pull requests.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:superprompt-forge.prs.signIn)

Not a GitHub repository.
Pull requests require a GitHub remote.

No pull requests found.
[Refresh](command:superprompt-forge.prs.refresh)

Sign in to GitHub to see issues.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:superprompt-forge.issues.signIn)

Not a GitHub repository.
Issues require a GitHub remote.

No issues found.
[Refresh](command:superprompt-forge.issues.refresh)

Sign in to GitHub to see projects.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:superprompt-forge.projects.signIn)

Not a GitHub repository.
Projects require a GitHub remote.

No projects found.
[Refresh](command:superprompt-forge.projects.refresh)

No Mattermost server configured.
Set the server URL in settings to get started.
[Configure Server](command:superprompt-forge.mattermost.configure)

Sign in to Mattermost to view your channels.
[Sign In](command:superprompt-forge.mattermost.signIn)

No teams found.
[Refresh](command:superprompt-forge.mattermost.refresh)

Google Drive is not configured.
Set your Google OAuth Client ID in settings to get started.
[Configure Google Drive](command:superprompt-forge.drive.configure)

Sign in to Google to browse your Drive files.
[Sign In to Google](command:superprompt-forge.drive.signIn)

No files found.
[Refresh](command:superprompt-forge.drive.refresh)

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && npm run build:webview && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && vite build --mode production --config webview-ui/vite.config.ts && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
